REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1034 reute u f BC-THOMPSON-MEDICAL-<TM> 06-01 0047

TEXT.TITLE: THOMPSON MEDICAL <TM> PLANS STATEMENT SHORTLY
TEXT.BODY: Thompson Medical Co Inc expects to release a statment in a few minutes, a company spokesman said. The New York Stock Exchange has delayed opening the stock saying news is pending. The stock closed Friday at 19-3/4. Reuter
